content: >**get 40% off when you buy 4 patterns through january no coupon needed** this is an easy to make crochet dishcloth that uses the chain single_crochet & half_double_crochet i used lily sugar n cream cotton yarn but any cotton yarn would work great for this washcloth/dishcloth i do make a smaller size than standard dishcloth patterns because i have smaller hands and the bigger ones just make it hard to use **full video tutorial is available here https //youtu be/umlrr0nycyi**
